name: Crazy Scientist: Lost in Dimensions
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 47.

In Crazy Scientist: Lost in Dimensions you play as a crazy scientist who broke his Time Machine and is now stuck inbetween times! Help him get back home by jumping, parkouring and defeating enemies and bosses!

Movement: WASD. Jumping: Spacebar.

The amazing music has been made by Thales Guimarães:

https://soundcloud.com/tacgmusic

https://twitter.com/TACGmusic

The awesome art has been made by Klaas Muller:
www.instagram.com/klaasmuller

And the programming by Bojan Koolhaas (me):
www.instagram.com/bojan.koolhaas
